channel.title: {Delta} How to make a new group?
channel.description:
Can someone please explain how I would make another group like Owner, Admin and Mod?
E.x. 1-mod 2-Admin 3-Owner 4-(New group)
Many thanks, Hookahguru

item.description:

But then those groups get admin priv…i dont want that
